events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but it does not fit me properly, and I would like to request a refund for the item. Please guide me through the process.
The customer has requested a refund due to size issues with the jacket purchased. Categorising the case under Refund.
Assigning the case to agent Sarah Martin for handling the refund request from the customer.
Hello, thank you for reaching out to us. I'm Sarah and I'll assist you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item has been used or damaged to proceed with the refund process?
My order number is 4587210. The jacket is brand new, tried it on once but did not wear it outside. No damages or defects.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately once we receive the returned jacket. Please use the prepaid return label we will email shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I will send the jacket back today using the label.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Closing this case as the refund has been successfully completed and customer has not requested further assistance.
